ModMetaData.name: More Sanguine Houses
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This is a mod that adds 4 new Sanguine houses to Dev Designer's House Sanguine mod. They have the same stats as the basic house, but this allows you to edit customize factions individually when using something like Xenotype Spawn Control.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MoreSanguineHouses][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
